body.name: Instant HEPA Quiet Air Purifier From the Makers of Instant Pot with Plasma Ion Technology, Rooms up to 1,940ft2, removes 99% of Dust, Smoke, Odors, Pollen & Pet Hair, for Bedrooms, Offices, Charcoal
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 11 hrs 30 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 20 hrs
features: ADVANCED AIR CLEANING TECH: Combines a HEPA-13 filter that captures 99.97% of dust, pollen, smoke, mold, & other ultrafine impurities, combined with Plasma Ion Technology that projects positive and negative ions in the air allowing you to breathe easy.
CLEAN AIR IN MINUTES: Filters up to 1,940 SQFT per hour, and AHAM-Verified to exchange 388 SQFT 5 times per hour, allowing you to breathe cleaner air in minutes.

AUTO MODE: Automatically senses the air quality and adjusts the fan speed according to detected quality. Digital read out of % air quality and light band indicates when air quality is good-white, okay-orange, or poor-red, and adjusts to get back to good.
ODOR REDUCER: Activated carbon filter layer helps decreasing unpleasant smells, allowing your rooms or office space to be refreshed.
WHISPER-QUIET: Light sensor automatically turns off displays and lowers noise to whisper-quiet levels when it is time for bed.
ENERGY STAR CERTIFIED: Eco mode cycles the fan on and off every 10 minutes, if air quality is detected good for 30 minutes, allowing 50% energy reduction.

LONG LASTING FILTER: Our high quality air filter can last up to 12 months and changing it is effortless! Unhinge the bottom of the purifier and swap out your old filter and swap in a new Instant Air Purification Replacement Filter.

A BRAND YOU TRUST: From the makers of Instant Pot, the brand that revolutionized the way you cook, is now transforming the way you live and breathe. With an Instant Air Purifier, you’ll inhale cleaner air, and exhale peace of mind.
NOT AVAILABLE FOR SALE IN INDIANA.
body.description: Instants Air Purifier uses sophisticated technology to deliver cleaner air, giving you peace of mind. It also removes 99.9% of other viruses and bacteria from treated air. (2 see above) And the built-in sensors monitor the air quality and adjust the fan speed automatically, to work 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. (3 see above) The advanced filtration system includes a HEPA-13 filter with carbon layer that captures 99.97% of dust, dander, smoke, and other ultrafine impurities in the air and helps reduce smells.Plasma ion technology projects positive and negative ions for cleaner air. Instant Air Purifier starts delivering cleaner air in minutes and completely recycles the room’s air 5 times per hour. (5 see above) With Instant Air Purifier, you’ll inhale cleaner air, and exhale peace of mind. And it comes from the makers of Instant Pot, with all the quality, convenience, and versatility you’ve come to expect from Instant. NOT AVAILABLE FOR SALE IN INDIANA.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I moved in a brand new home, it had a lot of construction dust and new smells. I bought this because I have a very sensitive nose and wanted to get rid of the thickness of the dust residue. It has cleaned the air very well as I no longer smell or sense the dust. When it does senses a smell it will turn on really high and it does get loud & the light turns red, to clean the air but it doesn’t last long. You barely hear it humming when it’s running normally. Very happy with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This little thing bust butt
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my office which is a smaller space but throughout the day and evening, the space doubles as a hang out and warm spot for the smokers in the house to smoke since we don't smoke inside the house and the office is in a finished side of our barn out back. I suppose that makes my office space my Witch Barn (feel free to substitute whatever letter you prefer on the first word lol). The small space fills with smoke rather quickly and tends to continuously have a bar room haze until the door opens or closes. At night, when you open the door you can watch the smoke pour out as if Willie Nelson has been in the room at all long chillin.I was skeptical at first with this because when I initially set it up in my office, the lights were off and it was dark. I thought something was wrong because the unit would come and for a moment and then turn off but the lights were still on. The following day, my husband and I were sitting in my office together working on a project, and he lit a cigarette. Within a few minutes, this little thing lit up red and turned on. That evening, when us and our guests were hanging out, it would pop on whenever anyone was smoking.5 stars because Auto mode is a life saver and the best part? No more bar room haze, no more dusty and musty smells, and it clears the smoke in less then 30 minutes. It's quiet even when its not in night mode with sound equivalent to the med-high setting on a stand up oscillating fan. Hands down best one of the best investments we've made so far and even better, my allergies aren't kicking when I'm in my office anymore. Will defiantly be buying a couple more, the bigger one for our living room and dining room, and a couple small ones for the bedrooms!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Value Air Purifier
reviews.reviewText: The Instant Air Purifier works like a charm. I had no idea how dirty the air got in the room next to the unfinished storage area where we keep litter boxes for our cats. The litter is supposed to be dust free, but it is not. If you have anyone with respiratory sensitivities in your home, this air purifier is a great purchase. Very economical, especially when you compare to other HEPA air purifiers that are much more pricy such as Dyson's line up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars If you smoke, this thing will constantly shame you.
reviews.reviewText: Apologies for the blurry pic.Any people who are like "Does this thing even work!?" obviously don't have a smoker in the house. Yes. It's practically silent most of the time until I decide to have myself a smoke. Then the thing turns red, kicks into high gear and does an impression of a jet engine. And I feel like it's trying to shame me. Yes, machine, I am aware smoking is bad for me. Yelling at me louder for it isn't going to make me quit instantly!!Other than that... there's really no hassle. Plug it in and turn it on. Everything's automatic, and you can adjust everything manually if you prefer.Oh yeah, don't forget to open the bottom (just twists out/in) and take the plastic off of the filter before you start it. WHOOPS.The replacement filters are pretty spendy... 50-60, I believe. (Feel free to double-check). It says they should last about a year... but considering it disapproves of my lifestyle, we'll see about that...UPDATE, about a week or so later: So after a day or two... even the first day. When I came home from work, it wasn't on. I wasn't home smoking up the place, so I figured it went into low-power mode. It said it would do that. As time went on, I noticed it wasn't kicking on. And I'd been smoking, this thing should be screaming at me by now. What's wrong? Plugged in, yes. I can feel air coming out very lightly. I could turn it on and off again, then it would kick on and start going red for a few minutes... then turn off before it even got to yellow. What gives?I had it in auto mode, cuz that seemed like the thing to do. And after some research, I discovered it goes into night mode when it senses low/no lights. Smart tech, you see! But my friends, it wasn't smart enough to realize it now lives with a guy who sits in a dark room all day and smokes like a chimney! Didn't see that one coming, did you smarty pants air purifier!?The solution I could figure was to just set the fan manually. Medium seems like a reasonable choice so it can actually sort of keep up with me, and also not drown out my PC. Turn on the ion... set the light dimmer so you can see the buttons in the dark. And boom.Knocks a point or two off for quality of life and perhaps value, since now it's just doing what my old one did that cost about a quarter as much. But with a thicker filter? Can't really tell you how well it's actually cleaning the air, since apparently it's been in power saving mode a majority of the time I've had it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very quiet and seems to work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet as a mouse.....
reviews.reviewText: Easy to get started and seems very efficient!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I always thought air purifiers were kind of a hoax, but I have two of these now. The first one I put in the kitchen, and whenever something is getting extra toasted it turns on and deals quickly with whatever smoke particles it detects. I bought a second to set up during a dusty home renovation project, and although of course it couldn't catch all the dust floating around, it definitely kicked into overdrive and kept the air more breathable when dusty things were happening. A sizeable fixture, but they're earning their real estate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it's not so quiet. However, it has changed the air quality in just 24 hrs.
reviews.reviewText: Right now, I am very impressed with this product. I have been in search of something that would tackle my house smells in between mopping and cleaning and this seems to be. A very good quality product. The sound that the machine gives off is comparable to a fan on high. It's not annoying.
